text: Los Alamos (, meaning "The Cottonwoods" or "The Poplars") is a town in Los Alamos County, New Mexico, United States. The town is located on four mesas of the Pajarito Plateau, and has a population of 13,179. It is the county seat and one of two population centers in the county known as census-designated places (CDPs); the other is White Rock. ==References== Category:Census- designated places in New Mexico Category:County seats in New Mexico
title: Los Alamos, New Mexico
